text:
TIRUNELVELI

Xavier Institute of Business Administration: ‘HR Summit 2016’, Rev. Dr. S. Arockiyasamy SJ, Director, XIBA, Palayamkottai, inaugurates, Rev. Dr. Joe Arun SJ, Director, St. Joseph’s Institute of Management, delivers keynote address, college premises, 9 a.m.

Department of Tamil – St. Xavier’s College: ‘Muththamizh Vizhaa’, inaugural function, Rev. Dr. V. Gilburt Camillus SJ, Principal, SXC, presides, 9.20 a.m., cultural competitions, 10 a.m. onwards, valediction, Rev. Dr. V.S. Joseph Albert SJ, Joint Principal, SXC, presides, Rev. Dr. Britto Vincent SJ, Department of Folklore Studies, SXC, special guest, 4 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous and Al-Anon: Regular meeting, Little Flower Matriculation Higher Secondary School, Tirunelveli Town, 7 p.m.

AMBASAMUDRAM

Rotary Club of Ambasamudram: Weekly meeting, Rotary Community Hall, Urkad, 6.45 p.m.

Thoothukudi

St.Mary’s College: Research Department of Zoology, national seminar on ‘Marine Bio-resources: Prospects and Threats,’ G. Sugumar, Dean (in-charge), Fisheries College and Research Institute, delivers inaugural address, Sr. Alphonse Roseline Mary, Principal, presides, auditorium, 9.30 a.m.

KANYAKUMARI

Annai Velankanni College: Dr. S. Lazarus, retired Principal Scientist, Indian Council of Agriculture Research inaugurates two-day national conference on ‘Biotechnology for Sustainable Development,’ Rev Fr. Dr. S. Xavier Benedict, Correspondent, presides, Tholayavattam, 10 a.m.
title: engagements
